website_summaries.verdict: What it lacks in frills, this sturdy toothbrush holder more than makes up for in functionality. Works especially well for electric toothbrushes.
pros: Streamlined design and chrome finish looks good in any bathroom
Straight slots do a better job of holding electric toothbrushes than most other wall mounted options
cons: Needs to be mounted to a mirror

website_summaries.verdict: Simple to install, easy on the eyes and compact enough for the smallest bathrooms.
pros: Suction cup makes for easy installation and removal
cons: Toothbrushes can easily slip off if bumped

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Holder :-)
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprise when the package arrived earlier than expected. Instructions were easy to follow. The holder is made with high quality material; not flimsy at all. What a great idea!.....after looking at all my other options on Amazon, the picture caught my attention. I'm glad I bought this one because it has everything I was looking for and more. It looks great on my bathroom mirror, a place to keep my toothbrush clean, and no mess to clean up after all that gunk left over in a cup holder. I will keep this item in mind for future gift ideas. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I just got it, so I can't really speak to its enduring nature. I can say however, it is solid and great quality. I love it. It was easy to install. Its excellent design contributes to the ease of install and elegance of appearance. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay on shower wall
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE - I used the 3M adhesive rather than the suction cup. It is holding well now. I would have preferred to use the suction cup, but my shower must be pourous. At least it’s staying on the wall. I like the design, it looks good and feels fairly solid. Unfortunately it falls down every 1-3 days. I've tried everything, but I can't get it to stay up. I'll try it a few more times, but looks like this is a return. I'll update my review once it is staying on the wall, or on the way back to the seller for a refund. So far, disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: chivyguitar

customer_reviews.title: Amazing don’t hesitate. Oh my suction
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I was honestly shocked how easy it was to put on and how extremely firmly it suctions on to the mirror. You would have to pry it off with some specialized tools to get it off it’s so sturdy. Of course all you have to do is untwist the auction mechanism and it comes of as easy as a snap. It’s beautiful, well made, easy to clean and so perfect. There is no buildup of moisture like those toothbrush cups with holes. This is amazing don’t hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn A.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the Oral-B electric toothbrush heads and Waterpick's water flosser heads!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some kind of storage/holder for electric toothbrush's heads and water flosser's heads. Regular tumblers do not do well: water collects at the bottom, heads touch each other, etc.. So when I saw this toothbrush holder, I realized that it might be just what I'm looking for! I was right, it works absolutely fabulous. We used suction cup, since we have tiled walls, and for two years already... it didn't fall off, it didn't rust, it looks just like new! And we have them in two bathrooms, both are great! So i ordered it for my in-laws as well.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I bought this because the case that came with my electric toothbrush laid flat & mold was growing in the top part of the electric toothbrush! So I bought this holder (& some new toothbrush heads) so the water can drain out & no more mold! They are out of the way & this is easy to clean. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is it is a bit tricky to get it on the wall, directions have to be read a couple of times to understand them but all in all I would definitely recommend it! I have had it for almost 2 months & it is still hanging there, no issues 😊
customer_reviews.author: sherri

customer_reviews.title: Suction doesn’t stay.
customer_reviews.text: Install was super easy. Just installed it and put a few things on it, took a shower and it held good. The next morning it was on the floor. I put it on again with only the razor, toothbrush and tooth paste and still fell down. It got bend on the drop.
customer_reviews.author: Esme

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great item for the bathroom. I was sick of things on the counter and having to clean around and under. This was easy to install - no more mess - easy to clean. It is extremely shiny though - will see how long it lasts and you may can even paint it a different color. I did not try because y fixtures are shiny. I love it and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie

customer_reviews.title: Quick way to beautify bathroom & keep it tidy
customer_reviews.text: Has elevated the appearance of the bathroom by keeping the counter clutter free and without having messy toothpaste residues from toothbrushes on a counter or in a cup. Easy to clean and strong enough to support a toothpaste tube and multiple brushes. Product came with multiple install options: suction, wall adhesion, anchoring. We chose wall adhesion to a painted surface, as that area does not have tile. Holds the weight well and installed in 2 minutes. Very study with a large attachment area.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I always have guests at my house so I needed a good way to organize everyone’s toothbrushes without stacking them in the cabinet. This is a great device! The toothbrushes stay in place and remain organized and easy to access. I mounted it to the corner of the mirror and even when I open the cabinet they stay securely in place. My bathroom is really damp but they’ve stayed put so far. It was super easy to assemble and mount, too.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and look good!
customer_reviews.text: I put two of these up on the mirror of our bathroom which has 2 sinks. Attachment on the mirror was easy and both hubby and I are pleased with the clean look our counter now has. No problem attaching them on clean mirror and handles hang over the counter for easy clean-up. Much nicer than what we had previously!
customer_reviews.author: Caroljean

customer_reviews.title: It really stuck!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that the smooth back, not sticky to the touch, adhered to the mirror and has held for a week. I like the smooth, easy to clean support part. No nooks and crannies to have to clean toothpaste remainders off the holder. Simple thing but it's nice way to store the toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: OHSue

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I used the suction cup attachment method (there are different ways to mount it, depending on your situation). It is very secure and wipes clean easily. My only complaint is that if the shelf is unbalanced (if you set something heavier than say, a tube of toothpaste, off center onto it) it will swivel sideways and lose what it’s holding. Otherwise, I’m immensely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Teagan Kleinsorge

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place.  I was surprised.  Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This is something I have been meaning to buy for years. It sticks to the mirror very well and stays in place. Pretty rugged construction. Do take care during installation to make sure the toothbrush holder piece locks in to the "key" slot or it will spin around once installed. That was my mistake but easily corrected. The little shelf is interesting but I probably would not bother with it again. They make a model without the shelf. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Charles G. Gage

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i needed
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush holder was easy to install and looks very nice. It was so difficult to find a holder that would actually let me hang my toothbrush up instead of having to use a cup type of contraption that sat on the sink shelf and gather water in the bottom which is just yucky. I am so happy to have found this. it is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Asmolik

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy holder, no more accumulation of gross water.
customer_reviews.text: Is metal (not plastic) and sturdy. The suction cup holds the unit steady, and it does not move once installed. Have been looking for a toothbrush holder that did not allow brush handles to sit it the gross water that sometimes accumulates at the bottom of many holders. This was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: AmaJen0607

customer_reviews.title: almost 5
customer_reviews.text: this is a great product overall but the holes to put the brushes are too narrow, I have an electrical toothbrush and barely fits. But if you are in the regular toothbrush regimen this is a great product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toothbrush holder ever! Looks good, soooooo much more sanitary than most other holders, and the suction is unbelievable. I’ve only used it on glossy tile and mirror and it works fabulous - won’t budge (had no need to try the adhesive so I don’t know how well that works).
customer_reviews.author: gem

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed to keep my electric toothbrush heads off the counter.
customer_reviews.text: My new Sonicare toothbrush came with 3 different types of brush heads. The SimpleLife toothbrush holder was exactly what I needed to keep the 3 toothbrush heads off the counter plus room for an additional manual toothbrush. It also has room on the top to keep dental floss or toothpaste. Great little purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be 5 Star but fell after a few weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated this product a 5 star but the adhesive that it comes with didn't stick past 1 week. I had to figure out a way to stick this on my bathroom shower without drilling holes in my tile. I was able to buy some adhesive putty on Amazon and so far so good. Overall the product itself is perfect for what I needed. The adhesive was the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara  Agura

customer_reviews.title: awesome. Suction cup even works on tile that is ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, awesome. Suction cup even works on tile that is a little curved out at edges. So nice to have electric tooth brush heads off motor bodies and able to air out. We now store motor bodies in drawer and hang brush heads on this. Very nice and a big upgrade for our small bathroom counter.
customer_reviews.author: Earl E. Bird

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this toothbrush holder!! It is shiny chrome and will be very easy to clean. I could not use the screws/mollys simply because my bathroom is all tile so we removed the black suction cup and replaced with the plastic disc and just peeled off the protective cover to use the sticky side.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It's on the wall of our shower to hold a toothbrush and razor. At first I was confused b/c it comes with screws but that's just for wall mounting. It has a pressurized suction rather than a suction cup. It was easy to install and looks nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: GraceW

customer_reviews.title: Suction Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: The suction cup does not work. We tried to mount it on our bathroom tile wall using the suction cup attachment and it kept falling off no matter how clean we cleaned the wall or how tight we turned the knob. We finally gave up and had to use the 3M double sided tape attachement. We're in a rental so we didn't want to fix it into the tile using the wall mount attachment. Other than that, it looks pretty neat.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Law

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for the essentials.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold my straight razor, brush, and the families tooth brushes. I was worried that if I pulled the mount I would rip the mirror off of the wall. It gave me the impression it was that strong.
customer_reviews.author: chazkez

customer_reviews.title: Won't stick to bathroom tile
customer_reviews.text: I tried getting this to stick to my bathroom tile wall with the suction cup over and over again, but it never held. I had to rely on the sticky tape backing in order to get it to stick. Looks nice when it's up.
customer_reviews.author: JJinNY

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to hold electric brush tips. I find that hanging them upside down is more hygienic. It's been almost three weeks and this thing is still stuck to the bathroom mirror. What more could you ask for? The suction base is plastic with a metallic paint. The part that holds the brushes is a solid metal.
customer_reviews.author: robotnik

customer_reviews.title: I has not fallen off the mirror yet after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: It does the job holding my toothbrush. It failed on the razor part though. Anything larger than like a Bic disposable, will not fit in this holder which was kind of a letdown for me. My Harry's razor does not even come close to fitting, and that's a pretty standard size.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use toothbrush holder
customer_reviews.text: We put this on our mirror and it blends in nicely. Was easy to install. Used to have our toothbrushes in a stand and would get water collecting at the bottom of the handles. Glad not to have that issue anymore. Fits kid sized (children's Therawise brand) and adult sized brushes (we have the Oral B size from Costco)
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Mom

customer_reviews.title: cute, clean looks and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to assemble and It minimize my small bathroom. I like it
customer_reviews.author: hera

customer_reviews.title: Suction power not strong enough , doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Suction power not strong . We have a small bathroom and it steams is easily with the shower . Each time the mirror steamed up the toothbrush holder fell off. There is any option to drill screw it into the wall. We can’t do that because our walls are tiled .
customer_reviews.author: Kelsea.Silva

customer_reviews.title: This will not stay on the tile wall!
customer_reviews.text: I have another version of this kind of toothbrush holder (the one without the larger hole in the middle for toothpaste) and have had no trouble with it. However, THIS one fell off when I used the sticky option, and so then I tried the suction and that fell off the shower wall in the middle of the night. I had it delivered about a month ago while we were waiting for our bathroom remodel to finish up, so I just installed it this week. So, now I am stuck with it because it is too late to return. It's going in the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Compact and perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed. We keep the toothpaste on top with my husband's electric toothbrush. There's room for the remaining toothbrushes and a razor below.
customer_reviews.author: Whittany

customer_reviews.title: does NOT stay on the wall
customer_reviews.text: my wall is clean and straight marble type wall, however, the product does NOT stay. the item does not stick on wall and keeps falling off even though i only hung 2 toothbrushes on it. it says it supports up to 10 pounds but it cant even hold 2 toothbrushes without falling. I was hoping i can put my toothpaste on top but for sure it will fall within the day if i did that. I have to keep pushing the sticky thing back onto the wall! ughh.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I've tried other ways to hang toothbrushes. This is the best. It has been on my bathroom mirror for almost a year now and has never been a problem. Holds on securely. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rainsayre

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and use. I use it to hold a razor (sideways) and toothbrush. Installation was a breeze and pieces fit together well. I have no qualms about suction to the mirror. Cleaning is simple - just wipe away any drips or stains.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me! In love
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this piece. I didn't want to drill any holes in my recent renewed bathroom. Since my medicine chest is mounted on the wall not inside the wall and the sides are mirrored it worked great. Attached it to the side of the medicine chest cabinet. Bathroom looks clean and the toothbrushes are handy without ruining the look of a clean bathroom. 😉
customer_reviews.author: giggles

customer_reviews.title: I love this, very impressed at how it holds on ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this, very impressed at how it holds on my tile. So glad to have a good toothbrush holder after years of searching 🙌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It's been a month and a half since I installed this on our bathroom tile. It hasn't fallen off yet. It also holds my toddler's smaller toothbrush. Works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: JHM

customer_reviews.title: Sleek-looking holder
customer_reviews.text: The order shipped quickly and was as described. I did have trouble getting it to stay stuck at first but as with most suction cup attachments dampening the suction cup area first did the trick. It's attached and has stayed attached ever since, going on 2 weeks now. Device looks nice and holds our toothbrushes with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: ceyanne

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I don't use to make reviews as soon as I receive a product. I try to allow some time to have enough elements to evaluate the product. This toothbrush holder has simply worked perfectly well. It hasn't moved a millimeter from the place I put it since I bought it and aesthetically speaking it hasn't lost its condition at all.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had it for about 3 weeks. So far no rusting or any issues. I decided to screw it to the wall because I wanted to use it right away. So far I love it! Good bye to moldy toothbrushes. And it keeps my bathroom sink looking very clean!
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: 9/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great except for maybe an engineering detail, the holder which actually holds the toothbrushes makes a 90 degree angle which in turn makes the toothbrushes easy to fall out, I bent it to give in less of an angle and fixed the problem, other than that everything is great with the product and it’s exactly as I imagined it and how it looks in the pics, would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Sunday_speed

customer_reviews.title: Suction works great
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush holder was simple and two ways to use it. The wall or the Bathroom mirror. I placed mine in the bathroom cabinet in which the suction of the material hold in place. I highly recommend this product to hold your toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for keeping toothbrushes and toothpaste organized but off the counter where they can easily be knocked over. Easy to adhere to glass using the suction feature.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Girl

customer_reviews.title: Stays put
customer_reviews.text: Great toothbrush holder. Stays put on the mirror without ever falling or slipping. A breeze to wipe clean and has a handy shelf to hold toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: gimlett

customer_reviews.title: Good, But Not Great For Razors
customer_reviews.text: This works well. The only reason I gave it 4*'s instead of 5, is because I wanted to use it to hang my razor on. It works well enough for disposable razors, but not the kind with replaceable heads.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. Prior to this I used a cup and I would cringe thinking of all the germs collecting in it. This product is easy to clean, you can have a toothbrush with a flosser at the bottom as it won’t touch anything and it’s just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Nice, neat & sturdy! Very attractive looking & functional! Win win!
customer_reviews.text: So much better than having my boys leave their toothbrushes all over their sink area! Looks so nice & neat! I even found a way to hang the toothpaste tube in the middle! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: sjb

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, suction feels very sturdy. Installation easy but I got hung up on matching the grooves up. I thought I needed to click them into place before suctioning to the wall but they don't fit together perfectly. But once you start tightening it into place using the suctionmount it settles and won't be rotating anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Holder
customer_reviews.text: It’s fantastic. A beautiful addition to our bathroom. Not super easy to keep clean but I’m happy that I purchased it
customer_reviews.author: T. Lane

customer_reviews.title: easy assembly (directions are included)
customer_reviews.text: We're using this as a toothbrush holder, and the suction mechanism seems solid (tight seal, hasn't fallen once). Requires some light, easy assembly (directions are included). It fit our needs perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Spudly

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it! You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. It's this subtle addition that makes my bathroom look chic and slightly modern. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Centeno

customer_reviews.title: Love this. wish i bought the wider one
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for ways to clear my bathroom counter space with our sonicare toothbrush and i love this! Kinda wish bought the wider one...
customer_reviews.author: PatTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this item. I’d been looking for something to hang out toothbrushes on. I put it on the back wall of our metal medicine cabinet and it works and looks so clean. Really organized everything just the way I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Disney Fan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mount
customer_reviews.text: Really simple product to mount. Used it in kids bathroom to decrease clutter on counter and works great. I did a wall mount but can also just stick to a mirror
customer_reviews.author: Rich Ovaltine

customer_reviews.title: So far it’s a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these installed in my tile walled bath surround, good so far. Pros: has nice chrome finish and looks nice. A little tricky, but suction cups stick to smooth, but uneven tile It is what it is, toothbrush holder and soap basket Cons: not yet. We will have to see how soon it rusts and if suction cups remain functional.
customer_reviews.author: Sean C.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: The toothbrush holder does exactly what I want it to do. It securely suctioned to the mirror and has not fallen off. It keeps all 4 of our oral b battery powered toothbrushes off the counter/drawers in a neat and tidy way.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and declutters my bathroom counter!
customer_reviews.text: Love how this declutters my bathroom counter using space on our mirror that we don’t currently use! Easy to install and hasn’t moved a smidge over the last month or so!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie L. Yandell

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Does what it needs to do. Had it up for about two weeks, still keeping strong. Easily holds four brushes and two tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Bob from Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Suction holds great on the mirror!
customer_reviews.text: This suction attached toothbrush holder is great for in the camper where we don’t want to droll holes to mount things. It seems to be sturdy and held tight for the last camping trip. Nice looking, no little parts to clean.
customer_reviews.author: ECSE

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. Fell the first time I put it up but with just the right touch it stays up and lasts. Don’t give up on it. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Sauceda Jr

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is small and simple and holds tooth brushes out far enough to drip onto the sink. Toothbrushes slide in and out easily
customer_reviews.author: dagny

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite thing I’ve found! My three kids share one rechargeable toothbrush and switch out the heads. We kept the toothbrush heads in little cups, in the charging station which would always get moldy, I couldn’t stand the mess everywhere and the little cups all over the counter. Then I found this...GENIUS!!!! It’s sharp looking and matches all the chrome fixtures. It stays put and the kids are happy to hang their toothbrush heads. 5 STARS!!!
customer_reviews.author: katia1024

customer_reviews.title: Suction is good on the mirror
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation will use the suction cup method on a mirror and it worked beautifully and it’s very strong
customer_reviews.author: Linda W.

customer_reviews.title: Sticks well to shiny wall tile
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Matches our bathroom faucet and mirror perfectly. Has been up for over a month now without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsea

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t get to stick
customer_reviews.text: Tried multiple times on different surfaces, and I just couldn’t get this thing to stay. Cheap and not worth the struggle
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful suction power. Never falls off. The mirror finish makes it look very fancy and high quality. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Collins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, holds tight.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is SO easy to use! and the attachment holds tight just like it is advertised. Cleaned up my sink area and now have more room. I used it to hang my Razor also. very functional.
customer_reviews.author: RBM

customer_reviews.title: My bathroom looks put together.
customer_reviews.text: One lf the best products I’ve purchased for my bathroom. Stick pad is very strong and looks sleek and great. Makes my bathroom look cleaner and more put together. I recomend sticking to tile or porous surface.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Baez

customer_reviews.title: Use the adhesive option
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Could not get suction to work at all but the adhesive has held up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Stahli

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for limited space
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. I like that it came with the option to use an adhesive since that was the better option for me. No more cleaning up the grime on the bottom of the toothbrush holder, and the toothbrushes have held steady so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Nice tooth brush rack
customer_reviews.text: The suction cup is large and well able to hold the rack on any glass. This is an easy way to move the brushes up off the counter and gain more space.
customer_reviews.author: Bondmgr

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a family with a small bathroom sink. Adheres right to our mirror, super easy to put together and my favorite part is how easy it is to keep clean! Happy purchaser !
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Strong and good looking!
customer_reviews.text: We had our old bathroom done over and didn't want any holes put into the new walls and when I spotted this on Amazon, we ordered it and my husband installed it over the sink. Easy to apply and holds the toothbrushes just right! My husband said, he would recommend this to anyone , as it can be put up so easily and looks rich! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Irene Jan

customer_reviews.title: Suction Feature Works Like a Charm for Electric Toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: The toothbrush holder has been suctioned to our bathroom mirror for the last several weeks with no issues. It fell off immediately after we initially stuck it up there only because we didn't follow the provided instructions. After re-suctioning it per the instructions, it worked like a charm. Our Oral-B electric toothbrushes fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca g

customer_reviews.title: Works.. for a while
customer_reviews.text: As much as we loved this as soon as we installed it, it kept falling off after only a month despite following installment instructions. I dont think there was too much weight on it either as we only set 4 toothbrushes & a regular tube of toothpaste on top, but it was nice for what it was!
customer_reviews.author: Ann P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! Sticks to the wall, and doen’t fall off! Exactly as advertised. We have it stuck to subway tile using the suction option - works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: HolySmokes20

customer_reviews.title: Sucks (in a good way)
customer_reviews.text: This actually stays! Lifesaver for my half bath with no counter space. Super easy to install on the mirror and has handled the “delicate” 😜 handling of a 9,10, and 13 year old
customer_reviews.author: KatieBit

customer_reviews.title: Meets and exceeds expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This looks amazing! It was easy to install. I love having toothbrushes off the countertop and not mingling with each other (and their germs). Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: kwp

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my kids bathroom and it has been up for about a month without any issues. We used the suction option on the mirror. It keeps the sink area much cleaner now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comes as sold no issues
customer_reviews.text: as described worked great no issues and hasnt fallen off
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Has been holding two brushes and two toothpaste tubes for months and has never fallen
customer_reviews.text: Great value for holding tooth brushes on the mirror with the suction cup. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Tanner Photo

customer_reviews.title: Nice holder
customer_reviews.text: Great holder. Took away a star because it came with scratches on it where the tooth brushes hang. But so far we like it alot.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Q

customer_reviews.title: Will exceed your expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, heavy duty, and provides perfect place to store our Oral-B toothbrushes and toothpaste. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to clear off the counter.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This was easy to install is perfect for holding my husband's toothbrush and razor when inserted sideways. Creates a neater look for the bathroom counter.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: After 6+ months it has not stained and has not fell from my bathroom mirror. It is very easy to install and uninstall. Great product

customer_reviews.title: Holder
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. has yet to fall or drop any items. good way to tidy things up.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Wish it came in other finishes but I love it will be buying again and would recommend to others

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product. Or looks really nice in my bathroom. It stays on my mirror! I do wish it had a spot for toothpaste, but overall great!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, clean bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps sink surface clean and air dries brush heads. Perfect.

customer_reviews.title: sticks great to our glass shower wall.
customer_reviews.text: Holds our toothbrushes easily and looks easy to clean. So far so good. But suctions to glass very well.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SUCTION POWER
customer_reviews.text: The SIMPLELIFE Toothbrush Holder looks great above the bathroom vanity. It has great suction power and is easy to clean. The toothbrushes fit fine.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Game changer. It is on a tile wall and has been there for months. Hasn’t slipped.

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to attach to the mirror and looks very good in my bathroom
customer_reviews.author: JunMyung Song

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't rust - easy to clean - doesn't mold like the traditional toothbrush ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't rust - easy to clean - doesn't mold like the traditional toothbrush cups, and it is easy to install. Wish I would have found this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Clean solution
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works great. Doesn't collect yuck and dust like countertop-standing toothbrush holders do. And it doesn't take up countertop space.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great toothbrush mount! I was happy to find something clean and simple to store our Oral-B toothbrush heads. This fits the bill. Very easy to install too.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Good toothbrush holder
customer_reviews.text: I like that now no more things on the sink especially since my sink is small.

customer_reviews.title: Strong suction
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Keeps the toothbrushes off the counter. Very strong suction.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

product_meta.title: SIMPLELIFE Toothbrush Holder Suction Cup, Mirror, Tile, Wall Toothbrush Holder Wall Mounted, Toothbrush Holder for Bathroom, Does NOT Fall Bathroom Organizer
product_meta.description:
Material Type:Stainless Steel| Size:suction cupToothbrush holder razor holder EASY INSTALLATION – So easy, a child can do it, NO TOOLS needed to place on the MIRROR over your bathroom sink & TILE that are NONPOROUS= NO TINY HOLES, turn the handle, and you're done! For ALL OTHER SURFACES, USE THE ADAPTOR with 3M TAPE because some tile-stone-marble are POROUS: TINY HOLES & NO SUCTION. WALL use our 3M TAPE ADAPTOR or included SCREWS.

CAUTION- NOT INTENDED for SWINGING cabinets. Fits 9mm WIDE toothbrushes which is 95% of all toothbrushes in the market, fits a simple-regular BALLPOINT PEN (look at the photo), some sonicare toothbrush & sonicare toothbrush heads may not fit. Fits almost ALL toothbrushes: adult & child, electric toothbrush & traditional. RAZORS TOO. 

SLOTS – Holds 4 toothbrushes. Has space for your RAZOR. 9mm WIDE slots, fits a simple-regular BALLPOINT PEN (look at the photo). Water accumulation is unsanitary, THROW AWAY that old-traditional dirty CUP HOLDER & REPLACE IT. AIR DRY is best organizer & bathroom accessory. 

HIGH QUALITY Our STRAIGHT LINE SLOT DESIGN is better than the CIRCLE SLOT DESIGN of our competitors. 304 Stainless-steel holder is rustproof with a very classy chrome. High quality stainless-steel rustproof, suction can hold up to 10lbs. 100% Satisfaction Guarantee!
feature_bullets: Toothbrush holder home bathroom accessories mirror suction cup, wall mount, tile, any surface organizer DOES NOT FALL.
EASY INSTALLATION–So easy, a child can do it, NO TOOLS needed. 3 OPTIONS: a)mirror with suction cup, b)3M adhesive for any surface, 3.screws.
READ & UNDERSTAND: some tile-stone-marble are POROUS meaning TINY HOLES & NO SUCTION of any-kind will work, so use our 3M ADHESIVE ADAPTOR if suction does not work. SCREWS included.

QUALITY–304 Stainless-steel holder is rustproof with a very classy chrome suction cup, holds up to 10pounds. MIRROR installation is highly recommended, turn the suction KNOB a 2nd time after 30minutes. 100% Satisfaction Guarantee!

NOT INTENDED for SWINGING cabinets. Fits 9mm WIDE toothbrushes which is 95% of all toothbrushes in the market, fits a simple-regular BALLPOINT PEN (look at the photo). Fits ALMOST ALL adult &child, electric toothbrush & traditional. RAZORS TOO. Bathroom organizer, use as travel accessories, best bathroom accessories. REMOVAL, unlock ALL except rubber, peel off with fingers.
